tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE car_accidents (
  accident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  car_model VARCHAR(50),
  accident_date DATE,
  accident_location VARCHAR(100),
  repair_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  repair_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE car_accidents (
  accident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accident_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  damage_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  driver_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE repairs (
  repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accident_id INT,
  repair_date DATE,
  repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  mechanic_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE car_accidents (
  accident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  car_license_plate VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  accident_date DATE,
  accident_location VARCHAR(50),
  accident_cause TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE car_repairs (
  repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accident_id INT REFERENCES car_accidents(accident_id),
  repair_date DATE,
  repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  repair_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  repair_id INT REFERENCES car_repairs(repair_id),
  claim_date DATE,
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  claim_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE repair_history (
  repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accident_id INT,
  repair_date DATE,
  repair_cost FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (accident_id) REFERENCES car_accidents(accident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accident_id INT,
  claim_date DATE,
  claim_amount FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (accident_id) REFERENCES car_accidents(accident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE accidents (
    accident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    location TEXT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE repairs (
    repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accident_id INT,
    repair_date DATE,
    repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make TEXT,
    model TEXT,
    year INT,
    plate_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accident_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE drivers (
    driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    license_number TEXT
)
